original_text: When the new seeds have completely grown, the man will cut down the plants. It is time for him to take the seeds to use for food.’
korean_text: 열매가 익으면 곧 낫을 대나니 이는 추수 때가 이르렀음이라

sentences.original_text: When the new seeds have completely grown
the man will cut down the plants
It is time for him to take the seeds
